description: Unified platform for 60+ AI skills across 17 professional profiles with shared auth, runtime, and SDK

userStories.title: Create auth-provider skill with OAuth and API key support
userStories.description: As a skill developer, I want a centralized auth system so I don't implement OAuth separately for each skill.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement OAuth 2.0 flow with PKCE support
Implement API key storage and retrieval
Encrypt credentials with AES-256-GCM using master key
Health check command shows all providers status
userStories.notes: BLOCKER: Required by 40+ skills. Implement first.

userStories.title: Create skill runtime with SKILL.md parser
userStories.description: As an agent user, I want skills to work consistently regardless of which profile I activate.
acceptanceCriteria: Parse SKILL.md frontmatter (name, description, entry, type)
Standardize JSON output format across all skills
Implement unified error handling with error codes
Health check endpoint for all skill types
userStories.notes: Depends on US-001 for auth integration

userStories.title: Create skills-cli tool with install and list commands
userStories.description: As a user, I want to browse and install skills easily from a central registry.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement `skills list` to show available skills

userStories.title: Create shared database schema for cross-skill entities
userStories.description: As a user, I want my skills to share relevant data (e.g., receipts → expenses → reports).
acceptanceCriteria: Create contacts table (shared across all skills)
userStories.notes: SQLite for local, PostgreSQL for scale

userStories.title: Create profile manifest system for skill bundles
userStories.description: As a user, I want to activate a complete profile (e.g., 'Accountant') with one command.
acceptanceCriteria: Bulk collect auth credentials during onboarding

userStories.title: Create skills SDK with init and test commands
userStories.description: As a developer, I want templates and tools to create new skills quickly.

userStories.title: Create monitoring dashboard for skill health
userStories.description: As an operator, I want visibility into skill health and usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Collect metrics: latency, errors, usage counts
Alert on skill health check failures

userStories.title: Implement email skill with Gmail/Outlook OAuth
userStories.description: As a Secretary profile user, I want to read and send emails via my agent.
acceptanceCriteria: Integrate with auth-provider for Gmail OAuth
Implement email list with search and filters

userStories.title: Implement calendar skill with Google/Outlook
userStories.description: As a Secretary profile user, I want to schedule and manage meetings.
acceptanceCriteria: Integrate with auth-provider for calendar OAuth
List events with time range filters
Create events with attendees and locations
Find free time slots across calendars
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Similar to existing calendar example but with auth-provider

userStories.title: Implement reminders skill with cron scheduling
userStories.description: As a Secretary profile user, I want automated reminders for tasks and follow-ups.
acceptanceCriteria: Create reminder with datetime and message
userStories.notes: No external auth needed - local scheduling

userStories.title: Implement binance skill with portfolio tracking
userStories.description: As a Trader profile user, I want to track crypto prices and my portfolio.
acceptanceCriteria: Integrate with auth-provider for API key storage

userStories.title: Implement price alerts skill with notifications
userStories.description: As a Trader profile user, I want alerts when prices hit target levels.
userStories.notes: Uses binance skill data or standalone

userStories.title: Implement receipt-ocr skill with expense categorization
userStories.description: As an Accountant/Receipt Tracker user, I want to extract data from receipt photos.
acceptanceCriteria: OCR extract merchant, amount, date, items
userStories.notes: May use Google Vision API or Tesseract

userStories.title: Implement invoice-generator skill with PDF export
userStories.description: As an Invoice Chaser user, I want to create professional invoices.
acceptanceCriteria: Create invoice with line items and tax

userStories.title: Implement web-search skill with structured results
userStories.description: As a Researcher user, I want to search the web for information.
acceptanceCriteria: Search with query and get structured results

userStories.title: Implement news-aggregator skill with RSS parsing
userStories.description: As a Researcher user, I want to monitor news from multiple sources.
userStories.notes: RSS parsing, no API keys needed
